settings.sub_heading: The smart mattress topper that lets you sleep at your perfect temperature every night.

settings.heading: The world's first Smart Topper that adjusts cooling & heating while you sleep.

settings.paragraph_content: The Smart Topper patented bed cooling system is a 2-inch layer that sits on top of your mattress with internal fans that propel air under and against your body. The amount of cooling or heating automatically adjusts based on built-in sensors to keep you at your preferred temperature all night long.

settings.section_heading: Imagine a Life with Consistently Great Sleep

settings.heading: Perfectly Snug has your Back Literally

settings.item1_content: Air is actively delivered under your body to keep you cool and dry.
settings.item2_content: Set it and forget it with auto start and stop at bedtime and when you wake up.
settings.item3_content: Easily set the temp with our app or with the buttons on each side of the topper.
settings.item4_content:
Separate controls for
each side of the bed.
settings.item5_content: Say goodbye to icy cold feet with three levels of foot heating.
settings.item6_content: Sensors monitor your body temp to automatically adjust cooling and heating

settings.heading: Active Airflow
settings.content: Air is actively delivered under your body to keep you cool and dry.

settings.heading: App & Scheduling
settings.content: Set it and forget it with auto start and stop at bedtime and when you wake up.

settings.heading: Physical Buttons
settings.content: Easily set the temp with our app or with the buttons on each side of the topper.

settings.heading: Dual Zone
settings.content: Separate controls for each side of the bed.

settings.heading: Foot Warming
settings.content: Say goodbye to icy cold feet with three levels of foot heating.

settings.heading: Smart Sensors
settings.content: Sensors monitor your body temp to automatically adjust cooling and heating

settings.heading: Perfectly Snug has your Back. Literally.

settings.heading_text: I Can't Imagine My Life Without It

settings.testimonial_paragraph: "This is a great matress topper keeping me cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Worth the expense for a great nights sleep…”
“I am obsessed with the Perfectly Snug topper. It gets 5 stars. It’s changed my ability to sleep.”
“We love this topper! Keeps us cool on the hottest nights and days (nightshifter!!). We both sleep so much better now!”
“Love the simplicity of the service and the prompt customer support. We can’t imagine working without it.”
“Love the simplicity of the service and the prompt customer support. We can’t imagine working without it.”

settings.paragraph_content: We're so confident that The Smart Topper will improve your quality of sleep and eliminate or reduce night time sweats or hot flashes that we are offering a 30 Day Sleep Guarantee. If you don't love the Smart Topper within 30 nights, we'll take it back and refund you the purchase price.

settings.slider_headline: “As a clinical psychologist and insomnia specialist, I found that the Perfectly Snug Smart Topper helps in reducing sleep disturbances and improving sleep efficiency.”

settings.question2: Does it Work on articulated bed?
settings.answer2: The Smart Topper does work on an articulated bed. We recommend using the included bed-corner straps to keep your Smart Topper in place.

settings.question2: Does it work on adjustable beds?
settings.answer2: Yes it does, unlike some of our competitors. We recommend using our bed-corner straps-included with the topper- to hold it in place.
settings.question3: What sheets does it work with?
settings.answer3: The Smart Topper works with all breathable sheets. We recommend cotton, bamboo or linen. Try breathing through the sheets and if it is easy then it will work! We don't recommend using mattress protectors over the Smart Topper or it will hinder the airflow.

settings.answer1: The Smart Topper is powered by low voltage DC power from a power brick that plugs into any standard wall outlet. The power supply will work in any country.
settings.question2: Can I wash the Smart Topper?
settings.answer2:
The cover of the Smart Topper can be washed.

Learn more about washing details here.
